Disadvantage

Source: XPHB, page 366

If you have Disadvantage on a D20 Test|XPHB, roll two d20s and use the lower roll. A roll can't be affected by more than one Disadvantage, and Advantage|XPHB and Disadvantage on the same roll cancel each other.
